duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle high-stakes litigation cases throughout California, representing clients in diverse legal matters.
Maintain an active trial practice, handling courtroom proceedings and representing clients in litigation matters.
Make an immediate impact by leveraging expertise to effectively advocate for clients and achieve positive legal outcomes.
Work alongside seasoned litigators, leveraging their experience and knowledge to enhance legal strategies and practices.
Contribute to a unique and collaborative legal environment, fostering professional growth and diverse perspectives.
Maintain CA Bar membership and fulfill all professional and ethical responsibilities as an attorney.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctor (J.D.) degree from an accredited law school. CA Bar membership is required.
